p: Thank you for submitting your article "Rift Valley fever virus NSs protein core domain structure suggests molecular basis for pathogenic nuclear filaments" for consideration by eLife. Your article has been reviewed by three peer reviewers, and the evaluation has been overseen by John Kuriyan as the Senior Editor and Reviewing Editor. The following individuals involved in review of your submission have agreed to reveal their identity: Yorgo Modis (Reviewer #1); Jason Mclellan (Reviewer #2), Richard J Kuhn (Reviewer #3).
